name: Relative Peril
description:
Relative Peril:

Take the role of a space traveler looking for their wayward mother, stranded on a hostile planet. Using nothing but the tools at your disposal, solve the puzzle surrounding the mysterious planet's workings.

A game based heavily around player exploration and experimentation, use the systems at hand to interact with puzzles and enemies alike.

Controls:

-WASD to move

-Aim with Mouse

-Fire various tools with RMB/LMB

-Q/E To swap between acquired tools
